trends: There have been no other sightings in Tarnobrzeg
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: dowell first of all i have recently heard,that around 90%of UFO sighting describes so-cold ball of light,i have seen this phenomena two times ,frankly speaking i do not feel like describing it all over again for a couple of reason:The most important is,i do not see the point way you guys demand ,or wait for reports about it,and at the same time the public in general do not receive any explanation ,what the hell this glowing balls are?The other irritating thing is when so cold expert try s to estimate the reliability of the person who encountered it,i have got the impression that the only reliable people to make a report are police-haha ,i wouldn t trust polish police.
